label: thm-revival-guarantee
name: Almost‑sure revival under the global constraint
natural_language_statement: Under the global constraint (Axiom of Guaranteed Revival), all dead walkers are revived with probability 1 during the cloning stage. This ensures that the swarm maintains a minimum population size and prevents extinction.
